attributes.action: Stop Shamima Begum from returning to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a woman who at 19 years of age states she has ‘no regrets’ joining ISIS and that seeing decapitated heads does not faze her. 

Do we really want that sort of person welcomed back into Britain with open arms?
attributes.background: Shamima Begum left the UK voluntary under no duress and joined ISIS thereby becoming the enemy. Now things have not gone as she hoped she wants to be forgiven and come back to the UK and have her baby on the NHS courtesy of the tax payer.
